Name: Night Escaper
About the game: Survive! Your space plane crashed into the cursed land of creatures. Eradicating creatures is the only way you can survive. Night Escaper is a shooting Rogue-like game in which everything is reset when a player character dies. Enemies are created in a total of 20 stages on one map to chase you. Basically, you can kill an enemy with a given gun. In addition to the basic gun, you can get an artifact every time you clear the step. Each artifact has its own unique effects and can be enhanced through Gem that can be acquired during the game. Artifact also gives you a powerful skills based on the combination of artifacts. Use artifact, special skills, and guns to survive to the end.
